video.title: The A-Team
video.synopsis: A group of Vietnam vets wrongly convicted of a crime they didn't commit escape from prison and become soldiers of fortune to help people in need.

episodes.synopsis: When intrepid reporter Amy Allen finally tracks down the elusive A-Team, she hires them to find a colleague who's been captured by Mexican criminals.
episodes.title: Mexican Slayride: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Hannibal and team journey to Mexico to locate a missing journalist, they find themselves confronting a gang of guerrillas growing marijuana.
episodes.title: Mexican Slayride: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team is called on to rescue a young girl from a fanatical religious cult, only to be captured and marked for sacrifice. Can Murdock rescue them?
episodes.title: Children of Jamestown

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team infiltrates a Florida prison to stop an old friend of B.A.'s from fighting in a lethal boxing match arranged by the crooked warden.
episodes.title: Pros and Cons

episodes.synopsis: An honest cop hires the A-Team to expose a rogue mercenary S.W.A.T. team. But can the A-Team bring them to justice before becoming their next targets?
episodes.title: A Small and Deadly War

episodes.synopsis: When the A-Team seeks treatment for a gunshot wound, the doctor turns them in. But the sheriff needs their help when a biker gang rides into town.
episodes.title: Black Day at Bad Rock

episodes.synopsis: When a college professor who's developed a surefire gambling system goes missing in Las Vegas, his students hire the A-Team to find him.
episodes.title: The Rabbit Who Ate Las Vegas

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team helps a group of neighborhood shopkeepers stand up to a protection racket run by a ruthless New York City nightclub owner.
episodes.title: The Out-of-Towners

episodes.synopsis: When the A-Team's plane crashes deep in the South Carolina woods, the team tries to save a wayward surveyor from the clutches of sadistic locals.
episodes.title: Holiday in the Hills

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team helps a local farmer get his produce to market despite a greedy landowner's attempts to take over his acreage.
episodes.title: West Coast Turnaround

episodes.synopsis: Col. Lynch finally traps the A-Team -- until a top official sends the team overseas to rescue a captured general and his daughter from a mad dictator.
episodes.title: One More Time

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is forced to marry her late father's business partner -- and possible murderer -- Hannibal picks Face to be the replacement bridegroom.
episodes.title: Till Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team is hired to free a 747 from desperate hijackers. With Hannibal and Face captured and B.A. afraid of flying, the rescue is left to Murdock.
episodes.title: The Beast From the Belly of a Boeing

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team travels to a small town for an old war buddy's funeral. When they discover their friend was killed by local thugs, the team exacts revenge.
episodes.title: A Nice Place to Visit

episodes.synopsis: The guys set off on a risky mission to Zimbabwe when a woman hires the A-Team to protect the diamond mine she's inherited from her murdered father.
episodes.title: Diamonds 'n' Dust

episodes.synopsis: When the A-Team runs into the kindly cook who snuck them food in a Vietnamese POW camp, they help him escape the wrath of the camp's former commander.
episodes.title: Recipe for Heavy Bread

episodes.synopsis: A troubling message from Face's ex-girlfriend sends the A-Team to Ecuador, where she's now a nun whose convent has been besieged by gangsters.
episodes.title: The Only Church in Town

episodes.synopsis: A girl begs B.A. to help her mom who's imprisoned by brutal coyotes in a smuggling ring, but Hannibal's undercover work could lead to his own demise.
episodes.title: Bad Time on the Border

episodes.synopsis: Hannibal and the gang help an American Indian save wild mustangs from slaughter, as Col. Roderick Decker begins his hunt for the fugitive A-Team.
episodes.title: When You Comin' Back, Range Rider?: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Hannibal and the gang help an American Indian save wild mustangs from slaughter, as Col. Roderick Decker begins his hunt for the fugitive A-Team.
episodes.title: When You Comin' Back, Range Rider?: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team is drawn into a Los Angeles taxicab war when the guys help a small cab company that's being pushed out of business by a larger company.
episodes.title: The Taxicab Wars

episodes.synopsis: While dodging the relentless Col. Decker, the A-Team helps a group of migrant farm workers who suffer the abusive actions of a ruthless landowner.
episodes.title: Labor Pains

episodes.synopsis: While running from Decker, the A-Team helps the residents of a small fishing village who are being forced to give half their catches to a bully.
episodes.title: There's Always a Catch

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team helps three disabled vets when a greedy developer tries to force them off their property in order to get to the underground spring water.
episodes.title: Water, Water Everywhere

episodes.synopsis: After a construction company owner is nearly killed by a ruthless competitor, he calls the A-Team. But the guys didn't expect to tangle with the mob.
episodes.title: Steel

episodes.synopsis: To thwart a corrupt sheriff, Face replaces the candidate who was killed while running against him. But the media coverage leads Decker to the A-Team.
episodes.title: The White Ballot

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team takes on a secret Chinese gang to protect their friend from extortion. But the guys worry they've bitten off more than they can chew.
episodes.title: The Maltese Cow

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team flies to South America to help a downed cargo pilot accused of drug smuggling. But the real, well-connected smuggler may escape justice.
episodes.title: In Plane Sight

episodes.synopsis: Working undercover, journalist Tawnia Baker alerts the A-Team that Decker is onto them. Later, after rescuing her, the A-Team asks her to join them.
episodes.title: The Battle of Bel-Air

episodes.synopsis: An army corporal hires the A-Team to look into the death of her brother, and they nearly come face-to-face with Col. Decker.
episodes.title: Say It With Bullets

episodes.synopsis: Face's old war buddy, now a Southern minister, asks the A-Team to help stop a local ne'er-do-well from selling moonshine in his county.
episodes.title: Pure-Dee Poison

episodes.synopsis: Working undercover at a casino, the A-Team takes on a gang of high-powered criminals who use hardcore commando tactics to terrorize and rob tourists.
episodes.title: It's a Desert Out There

episodes.synopsis: The guys use their own cars as bait to bust a ring of car thieves. But things get heated when the team can't find B.A.'s stolen van.
episodes.title: Chopping Spree

episodes.synopsis: A seemingly straightforward hostage rescue turns complicated when the smitten victim doesn't want to part from one of her captors.
episodes.title: Harder Than it Looks

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team takes a break to do paramilitary training and discovers that some of the criminals they've thwarted have joined forces to take them down.
episodes.title: Deadly Maneuvers

episodes.synopsis: A pacifist religious community hires the A-Team to control -- without the use of violence -- a group of bullies trying to run them off their land.
episodes.title: Semi-Friendly Persuasion

episodes.synopsis: While looking for a doctor for Murdock, who nobly took a bullet for Hannibal, the team recalls some of their injured pal's most memorable moments.
episodes.title: Curtain Call

episodes.synopsis: The team runs up against a crafty river pirate while traveling to the Amazon in search of a client's archaeologist friend -- and secret fiancé.
episodes.title: The Bend in the River: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As the A-Team continues to look for a client's missing fiancé in the dense Amazon rain forest, they must draw on their Vietnam experiences to survive.
episodes.title: The Bend in the River: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A fire chief drafts the A-Team to take on an aggressive private company that's trying to replace her unit.
episodes.title: Fire

episodes.synopsis: When a corrupt union organizer tries to force a small logging company out of business, the A-Team fights back. Meanwhile, Murdock hunts for Bigfoot.
episodes.title: Timber!

episodes.synopsis: A former mob accountant enlists the A-Team to find his kidnapped daughter. But the team's involvement broadens the turf war, putting others in danger.
episodes.title: Double Heat

episodes.synopsis: When a group of auto plant workers recruits the A-Team to look into employee theft, the guys find that the pilfering goes deeper than they suspected.
episodes.title: Trouble on Wheels

episodes.synopsis: A doctor who saved B.A.'s life in Vietnam asks the A-Team to help dispatch a gang of thugs who are making trouble on a tiny island.
episodes.title: The Island

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team is getting lots of bad press thanks to some masquerading scoundrels who are impersonating the guys at a Wild West show.
episodes.title: Showdown!

episodes.synopsis: Hannibal goes undercover as a music producer to help an all-girl group when the band's former record label starts hassling them.
episodes.title: The Bells of St. Marys

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team rescues Face's new model girlfriend from the Chicago mobster who abducted her -- but her gratitude is underwhelming.
episodes.title: Hot Styles

episodes.synopsis: Armed robbers hijack Murdock and take him hostage, but the cops are convinced that he and B.A. are accomplices to the crime.
episodes.title: Breakout!

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team steps in to help the proprietor of a tiny diner when he won't sell to the owner of a restaurant chain who refuses to take no for an answer.
episodes.title: Cup A' Joe

episodes.synopsis: A bistro owner and his daughter call in Hannibal and the team to take down a brutal loan shark who's threatening restaurateurs.
episodes.title: The Big Squeeze

episodes.synopsis: To break up an organization that's fixing boxing matches, B.A. goes undercover as a prizefighter but gets in deeper than he expected.
episodes.title: Champ!

episodes.synopsis: When Kenyan poachers gun down a game warden who refuses to allow their illegal hunting, the A-Team heads to East Africa to set things straight.
episodes.title: Skins

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team assists with security at a Middle Eastern palace on the eve of a princess's politically charged wedding.
episodes.title: Moving Targets

episodes.synopsis: When a vicious rival tries to force a small tow-truck company out of business, the A-Team steps in, only to discover that there's a lot more going on.
episodes.title: Knights of the Road

episodes.synopsis: A brother-and-sister business duo hires the A-Team to take on a waste-disposal company manager who's sabotaging their delivery service.
episodes.title: Waste 'Em!

episodes.synopsis: Bounty hunters abduct Murdock to bait and capture the rest of the A-Team. But he escapes and finds sanctuary -- and love -- with a lady veterinarian.
episodes.title: Bounty

episodes.synopsis: When the A-Team looks into a gifted painter's disappearance, the evidence trail leads to a corrupt art dealer, prompting Murdock to pose as an artist.
episodes.title: Beverly Hills Assault

episodes.synopsis: When a ruthless businessman tries to force two sisters to turn their organic soda company into a brewery, the siblings come to the A-Team for help.
episodes.title: Trouble Brewing

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team's plans to relax and fish at Crystal Lake are ruined when Col. Decker and his minions turn up -- but that's just the start of trouble.
episodes.title: Incident at Crystal Lake

episodes.synopsis: When a mobster kidnaps a judge's daughter, the trail leads Hannibal and the team to Italy and into the heart of a gangland war.
episodes.title: Judgment Day: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team returns home incognito with the judge's kidnapped daughter aboard a cruise ship. But mobsters are also on board and there's nowhere to run.
episodes.title: Judgment Day: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Hannibal plays the monster in a low-budget flick shooting in South America, but the local mob isn't happy about a film crew being in their territory.
episodes.title: Where Is the Monster When You Need Him?

episodes.synopsis: A gang of thugs terrorizes the residents in a Chicago apartment building, including B.A.'s mom. The A-Team uncovers who's behind the intimidation.
episodes.title: A Lease with an Option to Die

episodes.synopsis: A band of criminals kills the homeless to sell their identities. When Hannibal goes undercover, he's so convincing, he's mistaken for a wino.
episodes.title: The Road to Hope

episodes.synopsis: A young stock car racer is injured by a flashy, well-financed hotshot with connections to the mob. Enter family friend Hannibal to settle the score.
episodes.title: Blood, Sweat and Cheers

episodes.synopsis: With a dubious government pardon, Face abandons the A-Team. Now, Murdock wants to be resident con man, but an ambush may end the game for the A-Team.
episodes.title: Mind Games

episodes.synopsis: When a sexy rock star announces she's donating her concert proceeds to a poor African country, the nation's rivals make an attempt on her life.
episodes.title: There Goes the Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: When Murdock's psychiatrist is kidnapped, the A-Team heads to South America to rescue him, unaware that the woman going with them isn't who she seems.
episodes.title: The Doctor Is Out

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team makes unlikely allies with the Soviets when a deranged Russian colonel steals a U.S. satellite weapon and threatens to start World War III.
episodes.title: The A-Team Is Coming, the A-Team Is Coming

episodes.synopsis: When Face earns a trial membership at an exclusive country club, he thinks he's in the elite inner circle -- until the other A-Team members enter too.
episodes.title: Members Only

episodes.synopsis: Face inadvertently books Boy George at a rough redneck club instead of Cowboy George. The crowd threatens to riot until Hannibal takes the stage.
episodes.title: Cowboy George

episodes.synopsis: Mistaken for another mercenary group, the A-Team lands in the midst of an oil and land feud that could be deadly for a decorated veteran and his son.
episodes.title: Waiting for Insane Wayne

episodes.synopsis: One of B.A.'s ex-girlfriends comes to him in need of help when her husband, B.A.'s college rival for her affections, suddenly goes missing.
episodes.title: The Duke of Whispering Pines

episodes.synopsis: Hulk Hogan lends a hand when the team agrees to help an alcoholic ex-boxer and his son escape the clutches of a mob boss and ruthless loan shark.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Harry

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team goes undercover to find out why an oil company is muscling a small-time gas station owner and discovers an elaborate mob scheme.
episodes.title: A Little Town with an Accent

episodes.synopsis: The A-Team is captured by Gen. Fulbright and recruited to help him find the son he's never known. Ulterior motives may make this the last mission.
episodes.title: The Sound of Thunder

episodes.synopsis: Gen. Stockwell coerces the A-Team to rescue hostages on a hijacked airliner in Spain. Onboard is a man who may be able to vindicate the A-Team.
episodes.title: Dishpan Man

episodes.synopsis: Facing a court-martial for the killing of their commanding officer and a bank heist in Hanoi, the team wonders why Murdock isn't among the accused.
episodes.title: Trial by Fire

episodes.synopsis: After the A-Team is found guilty of murder, Gen. Stockwell puts a crimp in Murdock's plan to rescue his comrades from an Army firing squad.
episodes.title: Firing Line

episodes.synopsis: To create a diversion to help an East German scientist and his wife defect, the A-Team puts on a football game, with Hannibal as the team's owner.
episodes.title: Quarterback Sneak

episodes.synopsis: In exchange for a diary with political secrets that expose corruption, the A-Team takes a mission to reunite a dying man with his estranged daughter.
episodes.title: Family Reunion

episodes.synopsis: The team defies Gen. Stockwell's orders and goes after Hannibal when he vanishes while on a dangerous solo assignment in Hong Kong.
episodes.title: Point of No Return

episodes.synopsis: In the Australian Outback, the A-Team retrieves a crystal skull believed to possess supernatural powers. But a rival tribe wants it back.
episodes.title: The Crystal Skull

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to Monte Carlo to ferret out a terrorist known as the Jaguar. To prevent two assassinations, Murdock masquerades as a secret agent.
episodes.title: The Spy Who Mugged Me

episodes.synopsis: A girl steals her father's attaché case, believing it holds secrets he plans to sell to the Soviets. The A-Team must find her before the Russians do.
episodes.title: The Grey Team
